General.Name: Bionime Corp
General.Description: Bionime Corporation designs, manufactures, and sells medical instruments in China, Switzerland, the United States, Algeria, Egypt, and internationally. The company offers blood glucose monitors, as well as accessories, such as test strips and lancing devices medical equipment companies, pharmacies, and hospitals. It is also involved in the provision of biotechnology services; examining of pharmaceuticals; and selling of precision instruments. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.
